name: VR Pterosaur Rock Climbing
description:
This is a thrilling 3D virtual VR game; the dragon knight is trapped in the castle while exploring,

The dragon knight's dinosaur mount and the group tried to save it, but the hole was too small to do anything, so they could only circle around to guard against it.

Dragon Rider escapes the castle with a thrilling rock climb to rendezvous with the dinosaur mount.

Instructions:
Grab: Left/Right Gamepad Trigger
Position: left hand grip button
Walking: left handle up/down/left/right
Steering: right handle left/right
